snippet: RIM, the maker of BlackBerrys, has hired Amir Blumenfeld and Streeter Seidell from CollegeHumor.com as part of a youth oriented campaign it calls "The New 2012 Challenge Council Project."
abstract: RIM, the maker of BlackBerrys, has hired Amir Blumenfeld and Streeter Seidell from CollegeHumor.com as part of a youth oriented campaign it calls "The New 2012 Challenge Council Project."
